Package game

Class VendingItemFactory

java.lang.Object
game.VendingItemFactory
public class VendingItemFactory
extends java.lang.Object
A factory class that creates instances of each vending machine item. Uses VendingMachineItems enum class to determine which item to create.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Tim Jordan, Enoch Leow
See Also:
VendingMachine, VendingItemFactory
